languages.text: "Мне все равно, покуда я могу быть рядом с вами. Продлится ли это год или вечность — неважно".

traits.locale_text: "Мне все равно, покуда я могу быть рядом с вами. Продлится ли это год или вечность — неважно".

languages.text: "None of that matters to me as long as I can be with you. As for whether we have a year or a life ahead of us — is it really all that important?"
languages.original_text: "Мне все равно, покуда я могу быть рядом с вами. Продлится ли это год или вечность — неважно".

traits.locale_text: "None of that matters to me as long as I get to be with you. As for whether we have a year or an eternity ahead of us — is it all that important?"
"None of that matters to me as long as I get to be with you. As for whether we have a year or an eternity ahead of us — is it all that important?"
"None of that matters to me as long as I can be with you. As for whether we have a year or an eternity ahead of us — is it really all that important?"
"None of that matters to me as long as I can be with you. As for whether we have a year or an eternity ahead of us — is it really all that important?"
"None of that matters to me as long as I can be with you. As for whether we have a year or a life ahead of us — is it really all that important?"

languages.text: “只要能和你在一起，你所说的都无关紧要。至于我们的未来，是只有一年，还是无尽的永恒，这真的那么重要吗？”
languages.original_text: "None of that matters to me as long as I can be with you. As for whether we have a year or a life ahead of us — is it really all that important?"

traits.locale_text: “只要能和你在一起，你所说的都无关紧要。至于我们的未来，是只有一年，还是无尽的永恒，这真的那么重要吗？”

languages.text: "Das ist mir alles gleichgültig, so lange ich bei Euch sein kann. Und ob nun ein Leben vor uns liegt oder eine Ewigkeit ... ist das wirklich so wichtig?"
languages.original_text: "None of that matters to me as long as I can be with you. As for whether we have a year or a life ahead of us — is it really all that important?"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist mir alles gleichgültig, so lange ich bei Euch sein kann. Und ob nun ein Jahr vor uns liegt oder eine Ewigkeit ... ist das wirklich so wichtig?"

languages.text: « Rien de tout ça n'a d'importance pour moi tant que je peux être avec vous. Quant à savoir si nous avons une année ou une vie devant nous, cela compte-t-il vraiment ? »
languages.original_text: "None of that matters to me as long as I can be with you. As for whether we have a year or a life ahead of us — is it really all that important?"

traits.locale_text: « Rien de tout ça n'a d'importance pour moi tant que je peux être avec vous. Quant à savoir si nous avons une année ou l'éternité devant nous, cela compte-t-il vraiment ? »

languages.text: «Nada de eso me importa mientras pueda estar con usted. En cuanto a si nos queda un año o toda una vida por delante, ¿es realmente tan importante?».
languages.original_text: "None of that matters to me as long as I can be with you. As for whether we have a year or a life ahead of us — is it really all that important?"

traits.locale_text: «Nada de eso me importa mientras pueda estar con usted. En cuanto a si nos queda un año o toda una vida por delante, ¿es realmente tan importante?».

languages.text: 「あなたと一緒にいられる限り、私はそういうことは何も気にしない。この先私たちに与えられた時間が1年でも、一生でも…これは、それほど重要なことだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "None of that matters to me as long as I can be with you. As for whether we have a year or a life ahead of us — is it really all that important?"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたと一緒にいられる限り、私はそういうことは何も気にしない。この先私たちに与えられた時間が1年でも、一生でも…これは、それほど重要なことだろうか？」

languages.text: "Beraber olduğumuz sürece hiç birinin önemi yok. İster bir sene olsun ister bir ömür... Yeter ki seninle olsun!"
languages.original_text: "None of that matters to me as long as I can be with you. As for whether we have a year or a life ahead of us — is it really all that important?"
